title: Identify By Intuition
text: Identify which diagrams would lead to only large (blue) or small (red) energy transitions.

title: Draw Transitions
text: Draw transitions for these diagrams a) and b).\n##figure3.gif##

title: Determine Energy Transitions
text: Determine which energy transitions are equal in energy and would correspond to a single line.

title: Match Transition Onto Spectrum
text: Match the corresponding transitions onto the spectrum.
